div.p: A code describing the sense in which the subject has risk of a hypothetical (future) finding. At present, this value set contains only one code, but it is presented as a value set to allow for more nuanced meanings in the future.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: A code describing the sense in which the subject has risk of a hypothetical (future) finding. At present, this value set contains only one code, but it is presented as a value set to allow for more nuanced meanings in the future.
